snippet: A solution to Syria’s civil war depends heavily on Russia’s willingness to stop enabling President Bashar al-Assad.
abstract: Editorial expresses skepticism about plans by Russia and United States to hold international conference on Syria, but concedes initiative counts as hopeful sign; underscores importance of Russia's willingness to stop enabling Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad.
lead_paragraph: A solution to Syria’s civil war depends heavily on Russia’s willingness to stop enabling President Bashar al-Assad.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
